name: Laura's Famous Aebleskiver
author: Laura
summary: Traditional Danish breakfast treat that's a cross between a pancake and a popover. Made using a special aebleskiver pan. Often served during Christmastime. Serve with confectioners sugar sprinkled over top. Maple syrup or jam are also delicious!
directions: Sift the flour, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl
Add the buttermilk and egg yolks; stir until you have a batter
In a separate large glass or metal mixing bowl, beat the egg whites until foamy until soft peaks form
Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form soft mounds rather than a sharp peak
Fold the egg whites into the prepared batter
Place an aebleskiver pan over medium heat; prepare each cup with cooking spray
Pour the batter into each cup to about 2/3 full
Cook until golden brown on each side, using a toothpick to flip, 1 to 2 minutes per side
